text: Alen Margaryan was an Armenian soldier who received the title of Hero of Artsakh at the age of 21. == Biography == He was born on 11 February 1999. In 2020 he took part in the Nagorno-Karabakh war between Artsakh, Armenia and Azerbaijan. He was killed by a drone strike on 30 September 2020. == References == Category:1999 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Armenian military people
title: Alen Margaryan
